amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to expand the definition of "major rule" to include any rule likely to result in increased access to abortion, abortion-related services, or abortion-related travel.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to expand the definition of a "major rule" to include any rule likely to result in increased access to abortion, abortion-related services, or abortion-related travel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 223 (Roll no. 258).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Good (VA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Good (VA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 223 (Roll no. 258).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
